## isIdentifier() function

判断 code 是否是有校的 js 标识符

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isIdentifier(code: string): boolean;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  code | string | 标识符的字符串 |
